data.text:
IZ*ONE Members Profile: IZ*ONE Facts

IZ*ONE (ì•„ì´ì¦ˆì›) (ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚ºãƒ¯ãƒ³) was a South Korean-Japanese girl group formed by MNETâ€™s Produce48, the third season of Produce 101. Produce48 brought together Japanese trainees from AKB48 & their sister groups and Korean trainees from many different labels. The members consisted of Jang Wonyoung, Miyawaki Sakura, Jo Yuri, Choi Yena, Ahn Yujin, Yabuki Nako, Kwon Eunbi, Kang Hyewon, Honda Hitomi, Kim Chaewon, Kim Minjoo, and Lee Chaeyeon. The group was co-managed by Off The Record Entertainment in Korea and AKS (the company that manages AKB48) in Japan. IZ*ONE debuted in Korea on October 29th, 2018 and they debuted in Japan on February 6, 2019. IZ*ONE promoted for 2 years and 6 months. They officially disbanded on April 29th, 2021.

IZ*ONE Fandom Name: Wiz*one

IZ*ONE Official Color: â€“

IZ*ONE Dorm Arrangement (as of June 2020):

Dorm 1: Eunbi & Hyewon; Yena & Chaewon (roommates); Minju; Yujin (solo rooms)

Dorm 2: Yuri & Nako; Sakura & Chaeyeon (roommates); Hitomi; Wonyoung (solo rooms)

IZ*ONE Official Accounts:

Instagram: @official_izone

Twitter: @official_izone

Facebook: official.izone

Weibo: Official IZ*ONE

V Live: IZ*ONE

Fan Cafe: official-izone

Website: iz-one.co.kr

Youtube: Official IZ*ONE

Naver Post: ì•„ì´ì¦ˆì›

TikTok: @officializone_

IZ*ONE Members Profile:

Eunbi (Rank 7)

Stage Name: Eunbi (ì€ë¹„)

Birth Name: Kwon Eun Bi (ê¶Œì€ë¹„)

Twitter: @kwoneunbi

TikTok: @official_kwoneunbi

Youtube: ê¶Œì€ë¹„ â€“ KWON EUN BI

vLive: KWON EUN BI

Eunbi Facts:

â€“ She was born in Siheung-Dong, Geumcheon-Gu, Seoul, South Korea.

â€“ She has an older brother who was born in 1993.

â€“ She debuted in the group Ye-A in 2014 and left in November 2014, her stage name was â€œKazoo.â€

â€“ Her official color is a shade of purple called Embroidered Starlight.

â€“ She is the â€œmotherâ€ of IZ*ONE. (181024 XSportNews Interview) as if 2020,Eunbi said on NOW radio that Sakura is the Father Figure of their group while Chaeyeon is the Mother Figure.

â€“ Eunbi has a knack for discovering dessert restaurants.

â€“ Sometimes Eunbi has lisps of letter S

â€“ She enjoys running and shopping.

â€“ She can play the guitar.

â€“ Eunbi is good at sports. (Idol Room)

â€“ Eunbiâ€™s favorite ice cream flavor is green tea chocolate.

â€“ Eunbi said that Minjoo and her have similar tastes.

â€“ Woollim trainees said that Eunbi is like their mother cause of her good leadership skills.

â€“ Eunbi worked as a part timer in a Paris Baguette franchise.

â€“ She was part of a dance group called PLAY.

â€“ She was a back dancer for Lovelyz.

â€“ Sheâ€™s known for looking like Irene from Red Velvet.

â€“ Her specialties are dancing, impersonations, and POP Art.

â€“ EunBi and Cherry Bulletâ€˜s HaeYoon are close, they share friendship rings.

â€“ Eunbi was featured in Dongwoo from Infiniteâ€™s â€œEmbedded in Mindâ€ solo live performance in Infinite That Summer 3.

â€“ Eunbi really admires IU.

â€“ Company: Woollim Entertainment

â€“ She debuted solo on August 24, 2021 with the EP â€œOpenâ€.

Show more Eunbi fun factsâ€¦

Sakura (Rank 2)

Stage Name: Sakura (å’²è‰¯) (ã•ãã‚‰) (ì‚¬ì¿ ë¼)

Birth Name: Miyawaki Sakura (å®®è„‡ å’²è‰¯) (ã¿ã‚„ã‚ã ã•ãã‚‰) (ë¯¸ì•¼ì™€í‚¤ ì‚¬ì¿ ë¼)

Weight: 43 kg (94 lbs)

Blood Type: A

Twitter: @39saku_chan

Youtube: Sakuraâ€™s gaming channel / Sakura Miyawaki

7Gogo: miyawaki-sakura

Weibo: Sakura

TikTok: @39saku_chan.88

Sakura Facts:

â€“ Sakura was born in Kagoshima City, Japan.

â€“ Sakura has a younger brother.

â€“ She attended Shigakukan Middle School, a private school in Kisarazu, Japan.

â€“ Sakuraâ€™s official color is a shade of pink called Cherry Blossom Pink.

â€“ Sakura trained for 6 years and 11 months.

â€“ Sakura has debuted in 2011 as part of the first generation of HKT48.

â€“ She had a concurrent position in AKB48â€™s Team A from February 2014 to December 2017.

â€“ She was chosen before as center for AKB48.

â€“ She was under HKT48, she was the sub-captain of HKT48 team KIV.

â€“ She graduated from HKT48 on June 19, 2021.

â€“ Her charm point is her larger ears.

â€“ Her hobbies include playing video games, reading, watching movies, and acting. She was a child actress and aspires to become an actress again.

â€“ Sakura received a Nintendo Switch and a PS4 from fans during IZ*ONEâ€™s fansigns.

â€“ Her favourite drink is green tea latte.

â€“ Sakuraâ€™s favorite Japanese food is sushi.

â€“ Sakura doesnâ€™t really like anko (red bean paste).

â€“ Her special talent is drawing funny pictures.

â€“ Sakura sleeps with eyes open. (IZ*ONE Chu)

â€“ Sakura is able to guess peopleâ€™s blood type just by looking at them.

â€“ Sakura is a Reveluv (Red Velvet fan) and her bias is Irene.

â€“ Her special skills are being able to sleep anywhere and drawing.

â€“ She was a member of theater appreciation and drama club in school.

â€“ A few of her other members say she has a very weird way of running.

â€“ She is also part of Kami7 (the term Kami7 describes the 7 most popular members among all 48-groups: AKB48, SKE48, NMB48, HKT48, NGT48 and STU48)

â€“ Sakura was given a lead role in AKB48â€™s drama â€œMajisuka Gakuen 4â€ (2015).

â€“ Sakura acted as â€œMakiâ€ in the Japanese horror miniseries drama â€œCrowâ€™s Bloodâ€ (2016).

â€“ Sakura was always in the upper ranks of Produce48 and was P48â€™s first center.

â€“ Sakura is the Father of IZ*ONE (Stated by Eunbi on NOW Radio)

â€“ On December 8, 2021 Sakura launched her own cosmetic brand, CRAN BY MOLAK.

â€“ Company (while on Produce48): EMI Records (HKT48)

â€“ On March 14, 2022, it was announced that she signed a contract with Source Music.

â€“ Along with Chaewon, she is currently a member of Source Musicâ€™s girl group LE SSERAFIM.

Show more Sakura fun factsâ€¦

Hyewon Facts:

â€“ She attended Bokwang High School in Yangsan, then she transferred to Hanlim Multi Art School.

â€“ Hyewon almost debuted in DAYDAY (debut was cancelled).

â€“ Her Produce 48 motto was â€œRadiating quirky energyâ€.

â€“ Prior to debuting with IZ*ONE, she trained for 9 months.

Yena Facts:

â€“ Yena is a big fan of Bora (ex Sistar).

â€“ Yena is a childhood cancer survivor, she had lymphoma & was told there was no chance of survival but miraculously recovered. Her family wasnâ€™t well-off so her parents had to sell kimbap every morning to be able to pay her hospital bills.

â€“ She is a former Polaris Ent trainee, and she is friends with LOONA`s Heejin and Hyunjin and DIAâ€™s Jueun from their trainee period.

â€“ Company: YUEHUA Entertainment

â€“ She debuted as a soloist on January 17, 2022 with the mini-album â€œË£â€¿Ë£ (SMiLEY)â€.

Chaeyeon Facts:

â€“ She appeared in the show â€œSIXTEENâ€, the show that created TWICE, but sadly was eliminated first.

â€“ Motto: â€œWhatever it is, unless youâ€™re crazy, you can achieve itâ€.

Chaewon Facts:

Minju Facts:

Nako Facts:
